nodes.text: Bezorite was a substance that was mined on the planet Jakku. When the traveler Corwin Ballast asked what work was available on Jakku, the bartender Ergel suggested mining bezorite or magnite on the side of the planet opposite to his bar might be an option, also mentioning that kesium gas might have been found near Cratertown.
Bezorite was first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
